While shooting film underwater is synonymous with shooting video on dry land, the sea holds specialized challenges that you should be aware of. To improve your odds of shooting an enjoyable movie, follow these tricks for underwater videography:

Stay Steady. Holding the camera steady while underwater is quite a challenge but one you must master however unless you want to make your audience sea sick. The only method you can master this 1 is with practice, practice, practice.

Forget zooming. Zooming in underwater videography ought to be prevented at all costs. This really is because suspended matter in the water could become magnified and cause a fuzzy image. Instead of zooming, gradually creep up on the object you are filming instead.

Leave car focus behind. When filming in an underwater setting, there are numerous elements that could float into your field of vision and mess with your auto focus. You may be filming your buddy playing with a stingray in the distance when an eel snakes across your field of vision, auto focus picks up the eel, and the whole effect that you were going for is ruined.

Watch your angle. Strive to shoot your topic from a front and somewhat underneath view. Since you can not direct fish and marine life in the direction that you would like them with go, this requires a lot of sitting and waiting for your topic with come with you. Avoid chasing fish, this just leads with spooked marine creatures and unsteady shots.

Use light. Proper light is an key part of underwater videography. Be sure with utilize plenty of light with sharpen your images and reflect brilliant colors.

Go for action. If you certainly wish To wow your family with your underwater videography skills, strive to shoot action shots very than marine existence idly passing by.

The principal component of becoming lucrative in underwater videography is practice. If you shoot a lot of movie, study what you've shot, and try to discover from your mistakes, there are that your skills improve with each dive.
